intro: Nintendo Switch™ Exclusive! A survivors game that defies common sense is here! Begin an epic adventure with a group of friends in a mad world!
description:
A pioneer of the "Frenzied Attacks × Deep Growth" genre! Experience thrilling, unpredictable battles in roguelike dungeons that draw you into an exciting world. When the protagonist and her friends enter the "Strange Hunting Grounds," they transform into cute SD characters and battle hordes of rampaging monsters in a maddened world. Against a backdrop of swirling purple mist and multiple moons, you can enjoy the satisfaction of evolving, synthesizing runes, and upgrading equipment to defeat hordes of monsters.

・Massive content! Play for hours on end until you reach the ending. Explore meticulously designed stages and adventure through the otherworld as much as you like.
・Rescue companions to unlock the option to switch between their real-world appearance and their "Strange Hunting Grounds" form on the character select screen.
・Strategic growth system! A variety of character development systems are included, ranging from basic upgrades to transcendental evolution.
・Unlimited freedom in character development! Create your own tactics with rune synthesis, and challenge yourself to become the strongest by upgrading your equipment.
・Monster and material collection! Collect monsters and gather materials to enhance your equipment and skills.
・A convenient feature shows the coordinates of rare items, such as meat, the Magnet of Wisdom, the Giant's Bean, the Goblin Mirror, and more.
・Equip skills to gear, such as armor, shoes, and gloves.
・Two modes keep things fresh! Discover hidden mysteries and rare items in "Exploration Mode," or take on gigantic enemies in "Battle Mode."
・Have extra fun with missions to find the characters’ real bodies!
・Enjoy immersive sessions of over 30 minutes or quick, lively gameplay in short bursts.
・Engaging story scenes with character dialogue! Lose yourself in the tale of Cynthia and her companions' growth in a world where reality and madness collide.

"In the Strange Hunting Grounds, common sense is shattered! Is it chaos from the very beginning!?”
Experience thrills and excitement beyond your imagination with your unique companions. Your Nintendo Switch™ is your gateway to a "strange and madcap adventure"!

Synopsis
Welcome to a world beyond your imagination! My name is Cynthia. One day, my life as an ordinary high school student changed completely. On my way home from school one day, I found an odd, old sign. The moment I touched the sign that read "Strange Hunting Grounds," I was pulled into a strange otherworld.

It's a realm of madness where common sense doesn't apply. There are several moons in the sky, and thick fog covers the ground. Countless monsters writhe about. Surprisingly, I woke up and found that I had become the main character of this world. I held a weapon imbued with a mysterious power, and I felt the thrill of victory surge through my body with each monster I defeated.

Now, you will face powerful monsters one after another alongside unique friends you met in another world. Why don't you join us? Once you experience this thrill, you'll never want to go back! Let's embark on a journey together through this extraordinary realm where imagination becomes reality: the Strange Hunting Ground!
